title: What the tax bill has to do with U.S. wealth inequality
itunes:title: What the tax bill has to do with U.S. wealth inequality
description: The richest one percent of Americans control about 38 percent of the wealth in the United States. Analysts report that the Republican tax bill, very soon to be the Republican tax law, will only exacerbate the problem. How will this break down on racial and ethnic lines? Who benefits and who doesn't?
